title: [Large-Scale] Workshop for Strengthening Instructional Design Competencies in Collaboration with Generative AI

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Instructional Design Concepts and Science Curriculum Content Knowledge
context.additional_context: Short-term intensive hands-on program for science curriculum instructional design improvement, focusing on generative AI collaboration experiences and classroom-ready solution development

learning_goals: Learners can generate drafts of science curriculum instructional designs with 80% or higher completeness using generative AI tools (e.g., ChatGPT).
Learners can apply a four-stage framework (Generate → Monitor → Apply → Evaluate) to systematically assess and revise AI-generated content in practical tasks.
Learners can exercise cognitive agency and execute effective communication strategies during collaborative processes with AI.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
